Our Technical Stack

Hrothgar · 20 Jan 2026

A quick overview of the technologies powering Clover.

Cross-Platform from Day One

We chose React Native + Expo so we can ship on iOS, Android, and web simultaneously. No “mobile-only” features, no crippled desktop experience.

The Stack

Layer Technology
Frontend React Native + Expo
Language TypeScript
UI React Native Paper
Backend Supabase
Database PostgreSQL

Why Supabase?

Supabase gives us:

  • PostgreSQL with Row-Level Security
  • Built-in authentication
  • Realtime subscriptions for messaging
  • File storage for photos

All without managing infrastructure ourselves.

Open Development

Our branding assets are public. The main app will remain private during development, but we’re committed to transparency about our approach.

More technical deep-dives coming soon.
